title: Global Streetscapes (OSM)
description: Contains the information of the OSM street segment found nearest to each image within its 10 m radius.
display_note: Since the imagery comes from crowdsourcing platforms (Mapillary and KartaView), the dataset may have variations in image quality and coverage. The data might be uneven in some areas, depending on how much imagery is available in a specific location.The dataset provides metadata about each image, but the images themselves are not included.
creator: Yujun Hou
Matias Quintana
Maxim Khomiakov
Winston Yap
Jiani Ouyang
Koichi Ito
Zeyu Wang
Tianhong Zhao
Filip Biljecki
publisher: National University of Singapore Urban Analytics Lab
provider: Healthy Regions & Policies Lab, University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign
subject: Neighborhood and Built Environment
data_variables: Unique image ID, Source (Mapillary or KartaView), Orginal ID (by Mapillary or KartaView), Snap distance, U, V, Key, OSM ID, Oneway, Lanes, Name, Highway, Highway type, Maximum speed, Junction, Length, From, To, Reference number, Tunnel, Bridge, Service road, Access, Road width, Area, Estimated road width, Reversed
